entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming south 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
